wm-license-cc-conditions-attribution-tex: Amaa wɔava abasobɔdeyɛ la, maa yɛ linke ne na maa yɛnwu saa nzenzaleɛ ɛra a. Ɛkola ɛyɛ ye wɔ adenle kpalɛ zo
wm-license-cc-conditions-share_alike-hea: ɛkyɛ debie mɔɔ zɔho bɛ nwo la
wm-license-cc-conditions-share_alike-tex: Saa ɛ fɔnla a, kakyi anzɛɛ maa moalɛ ne ɛhɔ
